Description: FDM 3D Printer for all custom robot body and parts.
Main microcontroller (MicroPython); controls motors, display, and Wi-Fi.
Compact high-torque motors for robot locomotion and movement.
Motor driver module for controlling speed and direction of motors.
Metal gear servos for expressive pan/tilt head movement.
Two 0.96" screens for animated, expressive eyes and feedback.
Addressable RGB LED strip for status and emotional lighting.
Rechargeable power source (1000mAh, XT60) for untethered operation.
Secure charging module (USB-C) for the robot's docking station.
Digital I2S microphone module for high-quality audio capture.
High-quality station with temperature control for reliable electronic connections.
